c74object.name: mb.harmonicsynth~
c74object.digest: Harmonic Synth is a synthesis instrument that allows you to create a sound by adding together partials from a harmonic series.

method.name: midi-note
method.digest: Lists starting with a number trigger a new midi event

method.name: harmonics
method.digest: Sets the volume of each harmonic in a list

method.name: phases
method.digest: Flips the phase of harmonics using a list of ones and zeroes

method.name: adsr
method.digest:
Sets the parameters of the internal live.adsr~ with a list of attack decay sustain release inital peak final attack-slope decay-slope release-slope.
You do not need to use all of the arguments for this message.
